title: Let's Play Halo 5 Arena - Kinda Funny Plays
description:
Tim and Alfredo play a full match of Halo 5 multiplayer.

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here: http://www.ORIGINPC.com

Each and every day, Tim Gettys, Greg Miller, and Colin Moriarty get together to talk videogames. 

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

Music by Rakohus!: http://www.youtube.com/user/rakohus
